languages.text: "Хочешь проверить?!" {n}Саргона быстро облизывает губы кончиком языка и с крика переходит на шипение:{/n} "Ну, как там вы, законники, любите говорить — последние слова?"
"WANT TO FIND OUT?" {n}Sargona's tongue darts out to wet his lips, and his voice drops from a shout to a whisper:{/n} "What's that thing you lawmen always say — any last words?"
languages.original_text: "Хочешь проверить?!" {n}Саргона быстро облизывает губы кончиком языка и с крика переходит на шипение:{/n} "Ну, как там вы, законники, любите говорить — последние слова?"

traits.locale_text: "WANT TO FIND OUT?" {n}Sargona's tongue darts out to wet his lips, and his voice drops from a shout to a whisper:{/n} "What's that thing you lawmen always say — any last words?"

"WANT TO FIND OUT?" {n}Sargona's tongue darts out to wet his lips, and his voice drops from a shout to a whisper:{/n} "What's that thing you lawmen always say — any last words?"

languages.text: "WOLLT IHR ES RAUSFINDEN?" {n}Sargona befeuchtet mit der Zunge seine Lippen und senkt seine Stimme zu einem Flüstern:{/n} "Wie sagt Ihr Gesetzeshüter immer so schön? Irgendwelche letzten Worte?"
languages.original_text: "WANT TO FIND OUT?" {n}Sargona's tongue darts out to wet his lips, and his voice drops from a shout to a whisper:{/n} "What's that thing you lawmen always say — any last words?"

traits.locale_text: "WOLLT IHR ES RAUSFINDEN?" {n}Sargona befeuchtet mit der Zunge seine Lippen und senkt seine Stimme zu einem Flüstern:{/n} "Wie sagt Ihr Gesetzeshüter immer so schön? Irgendwelche letzten Worte?"

languages.text: « VOUS VOULEZ PARIER ? {n}La langue de Sargona jaillit pour humecter ses lèvres et sa voix passe du cri au murmure :{/n} Quelle est la phrase préférée des représentants de l'ordre, déjà ? "Vous avez quelque chose à déclarer pour la postérité ?" »
languages.original_text: "WANT TO FIND OUT?" {n}Sargona's tongue darts out to wet his lips, and his voice drops from a shout to a whisper:{/n} "What's that thing you lawmen always say — any last words?"

traits.locale_text: « VOUS VOULEZ PARIER ? {n}La langue de Sargona jaillit pour humecter ses lèvres et sa voix passe du cri au murmure :{/n} Quelle est la phrase préférée des représentants de l'ordre, déjà ? "Vous avez quelque chose à déclarer pour la postérité ?" »

languages.text: «¿POR QUÉ NO LO AVERIGUAMOS?». {n}Sargona se humedece los labios con la lengua, y luego baja la voz hasta casi susurrar:{/n} «Como tanto les gusta decir a los Arbitrator... ¿unas últimas palabras?».
languages.original_text: "WANT TO FIND OUT?" {n}Sargona's tongue darts out to wet his lips, and his voice drops from a shout to a whisper:{/n} "What's that thing you lawmen always say — any last words?"

traits.locale_text: «¿POR QUÉ NO LO AVERIGUAMOS?». {n}Sargona se humedece los labios con la lengua, y luego baja la voz hasta casi susurrar:{/n} «Como tanto les gusta decir a los Arbitrator... ¿unas últimas palabras?».

languages.text: “想看看我有多疯吗？”{n}萨戈纳伸出舌头，轻轻舔着嘴唇，声音从嘶叫变成了耳语。{/n}“你们执法官常说的那句话是什么来着？哦，对了——有遗言要交代吗？”
languages.original_text: "WANT TO FIND OUT?" {n}Sargona's tongue darts out to wet his lips, and his voice drops from a shout to a whisper:{/n} "What's that thing you lawmen always say — any last words?"

traits.locale_text: “想看看我有多疯吗？”{n}萨戈纳伸出舌头，轻轻舔着嘴唇，声音从嘶叫变成了耳语。{/n}“你们执法官常说的那句话是什么来着？哦，对了——有遗言要交代吗？”

languages.text: 「知りたいか？」{n}サルゴナは舌で唇を湿らせた。怒鳴っていた声が一転、囁くような声に変わる。{/n}「お前ら法執行官がいつも言うセリフはなんだっけ─『何か言い残すことは？』だったか？」
languages.original_text: "WANT TO FIND OUT?" {n}Sargona's tongue darts out to wet his lips, and his voice drops from a shout to a whisper:{/n} "What's that thing you lawmen always say — any last words?"

traits.locale_text: 「知りたいか？」{n}サルゴナは舌で唇を湿らせた。怒鳴っていた声が一転、囁くような声に変わる。{/n}「お前ら法執行官がいつも言うセリフはなんだっけ─『何か言い残すことは？』だったか？」

languages.text: "ÖĞRENMEK İSTER MİSİN?" {n}Sargona'nın dışarıya uzanan dili, dudaklarını ıslatıyor. Bağırırken fısıldamaya başlıyor.{/n} "Siz kanuncular nasıl diyordunuz? Son bir sözün var mı?"
languages.original_text: "WANT TO FIND OUT?" {n}Sargona's tongue darts out to wet his lips, and his voice drops from a shout to a whisper:{/n} "What's that thing you lawmen always say — any last words?"

traits.locale_text: "ÖĞRENMEK İSTER MİSİN?" {n}Sargona'nın dışarıya uzanan dili, dudaklarını ıslatıyor. Bağırırken fısıldamaya başlıyor.{/n} "Siz kanuncular nasıl diyordunuz? Son bir sözün var mı?"
